summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed Nine Hundred Seventy-five and no/100 Dollars ($975.00) against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, to pay the cost of the installation of a Fire Alarm System in connection with the improvement of Jackson Street, in The City of Seattle, from Railroad Avenue to Thirty-first Avenue South, by Cluster Lights, as authorized by Ordinance No. 23889, creating Local Improvement District No. 2307.
